statements: SELECT * FROM CustomerData;
SELECT customer_name, email_address FROM CustomerData;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, subscription_status FROM CustomerData WHERE subscription_status = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM CustomerData ORDER BY customer_id DESC;
SELECT customer_name FROM CustomerData WHERE email_address LIKE '%gmail.com%';
SELECT * FROM CustomerData WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, email_address FROM CustomerData WHERE subscription_status = TRUE;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, email_address FROM CustomerData WHERE email_address LIKE '%@gmail.com';
SELECT customer_name, email_address FROM CustomerData ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name FROM CustomerData WHERE subscription_status = FALSE ORDER BY customer_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM customers;
SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM campaigns WHERE campaign_id = 10;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM campaigns;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE email LIKE '%@gmail.com';
SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name FROM customers WHERE last_name = 'Smith' ORDER BY first_name ASC;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM campaigns WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01' AND end_date <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name, email, campaign_name FROM customers JOIN campaigns ON customers.customer_id = campaigns.customer_id ORDER BY customer_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT name, email FROM customers WHERE id = 1;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM campaigns ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM campaign_targets WHERE status = 'active';
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(*) FROM campaign_targets GROUP BY customer_id;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE id = 1;
SELECT name, email FROM customers WHERE name LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM campaigns WHERE status = 'active' ORDER BY start_date ASC;

SELECT customers.name, customers.email, campaigns.campaign_name FROM customers JOIN campaign_targets ON customers.id = campaign_targets.customer_id JOIN campaigns ON campaigns.id = campaign_targets.campaign_id WHERE campaign_targets.status = 'approved';

SELECT DISTINCT customers.name, campaigns.campaign_name FROM customers JOIN campaign_targets ON customers.id = campaign_targets.customer_id JOIN campaigns ON campaigns.id = campaign_targets.campaign_id WHERE campaigns.status = 'inactive';
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, email_address FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, email_address FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM campaigns WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT campaign_id, total_emails_sent, total_clicks, conversion_rate FROM campaign_statistics ORDER BY conversion_rate DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, email_address FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT campaign_id, campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM campaigns ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT customer_name, email_address, action, action_date FROM customers JOIN campaign_history ON customers.customer_id = campaign_history.customer_id WHERE action = 'sent';

SELECT campaign_name, total_emails_sent, total_clicks, conversion_rate FROM campaigns JOIN campaign_statistics ON campaigns.campaign_id = campaign_statistics.campaign_id WHERE total_emails_sent > 1000;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_id, email, first_name, last_name, age FROM customers;
SELECT campaign_id, campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM campaigns;
SELECT customer_id, email, response_status FROM customers JOIN campaign_responses ON customers.customer_id = campaign_responses.customer_id;
SELECT email_subject, email_body FROM emails WHERE campaign_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM customers ORDER BY age DESC, last_name ASC;
SELECT c.first_name, c.last_name, e.email_subject FROM customers c JOIN emails e ON c.customer_id = e.campaign_id WHERE c.age >= 30;

SELECT cc.customer_id, c.first_name, c.last_name, cr.response_date FROM campaign_customers cc JOIN customers c ON c.customer_id = cc.customer_id JOIN campaign_responses cr ON cc.customer_id = cr.customer_id;
SELECT c.*, e.email_subject FROM customers c LEFT JOIN emails e ON c.customer_id = e.campaign_id WHERE e.sent_date >= '2022-01-01';

SELECT cr.*, c.first_name, c.last_name, cam.campaign_name FROM campaign_responses cr JOIN customers c ON cr.customer_id = c.customer_id JOIN campaigns cam ON cr.campaign_id = cam.campaign_id ORDER BY cr.response_date DESC;
